thread.title: At debate, Assembly candidates focus on issues, avoid discussing controversy
thread.title_full: At debate, Assembly candidates focus on issues, avoid discussing controversy - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: At debate, Assembly candidates focus on issues, avoid discussing controversy
text: Anthony Cappola, the lone Republican candidate at the League of Women Voters forum, briefly addressed what he termed, " the 800 pound gorilla in the room. " Democratic Assemblymen Tim Eustace and Joseph Lagana made no reference to the uproar over the book. ...
